name: CGDD-Project3-SpaceTravel
description:
The main priority of this game is ride. we want to create a special way of operation, different from the ordinary form of interaction like driving. 

So we came up with the element of gravity, which in turn was linked to the knowledge of physics, and decided to use spaceship exploration and the secret of cosmos as the main development point.

Level Design: Aaron Zhan

Programming: Jason Xia

Art: Jack Ma
